scripts.build: pnpm --filter @zeffuro/fakegaming-common run build && pnpm --filter @zeffuro/fakegaming-bot-api run build && pnpm --filter @zeffuro/fakegaming-bot run build && pnpm --filter @zeffuro/fakegaming-bot-dashboard run build
scripts.test:coverage:view: pnpm run test:coverage && node -e "require('child_process').exec(process.platform === 'win32' ? 'start coverage/index.html' : process.platform === 'darwin' ? 'open coverage/index.html' : 'xdg-open coverage/index.html')"
scripts.fulltest: pnpm run clean && pnpm run lint && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run build && pnpm run test:coverage
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t fakegaming-api:local -f Dockerfile.api . && docker build -t fakegaming-bot:local -f Dockerfile.bot . && docker build -t fakegaming-dashboard:local -f Dockerfile.dashboard .
